main event: Two girls observed two blinking lights moving erratically along the Ohio Turnpike on 10 July 1966.
interesting points: The lights were first thought to be reflections, but later identified as coming from a single object., The observed object had two blinking lights., The lights made extremely erratic maneuvers., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., It was a clear night and the object was at the height of an airliner.
witness description: two girls riding along the Ohio Turnpike
